translation.en: Harper, just please get your shoes on. Please.
translation.ko: 하퍼, 얼른 신발 신어, 제발 좀

translation.en: Hey, do you know what we're doing today?
translation.ko: 하퍼 오늘 우리가 뭐 하는지 알아?

translation.en: We're going on an adventure together.
We're going to get on a boat. We're gonna sail across the sea to a place
translation.ko: 배 타고 바다를 건너서 늘 해가 쨍쨍한 곳으로 갈 거야

translation.en: where it's always sunny and you can eat ice cream every day.
translation.ko: 배 타고 바다를 건너서 늘 해가 쨍쨍한 곳으로 갈 거야 거기서 넌 매일 아이스크림을 즐길 수 있어

translation.en: we need to leave now. Okay?
[whispers] Because there's a dragon out there.
And if we make any noise, or if we're too slow, the dragon will eat us. Okay?
translation.ko: 근데 소리를 내거나 너무 느리게 움직이면 용이 우리를 잡아먹을 거야 알았지?

translation.en: So are you going to put your shoes on for me?
Okay, Harper. I think you just have to walk. Is that all right?
-[man] It's the blue fishing trawler. -[woman] Right.
[man] Right, young lady. In you go.
Harper's been practicing this song all week.
translation.ko: 하퍼가 일주일 내내 이 노래만 연습해서

translation.en: It's been driving me and Jordi mad.
There was a woman in Germany who got a song stuck in her head for four years.
translation.ko: 독일의 한 여성은 4년 동안 머릿속에 한 노래만 떠올라서

translation.en: -Actually, I think maybe it was hiccups. -It's an urban myth.
Well, only until the big interview on Tuesday.
I just hope you remember us little people when you're swanning about the staff room.
translation.ko: 교무실을 배회할 때 우리도 떠올려 주라

translation.en: Oh, of course I will, uh…
Yeah. It's good. I think she's finally starting to fit in here.
translation.ko: 응, 다행이지 드디어 여기에 어울리기 시작했어

translation.en: I'm very happy we ended up in Barcelona.
Plus, she gets to be a planet.
Well, she's… she's Pluto, isn't she?
So are you going to tell me?
translation.ko: 왜 그랬는지 말 안 할 거야?

translation.en: I mean, there's got to be a reason.
Getting kicked out of the musical.
It's just, you seemed pretty vocal before.
I've got to go to the toilet.
[woman in Catalan] The supermarket will close in two minutes.
Don't miss our special three for two offer in frozen foods.
So, you know, we're closing soon to do inventory.
[in English] Oh, sorry my Catalan is very bad. Sorry.
FYI, when you throw a punch, you need to keep your fist tight.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 펀치를 날릴 땐 주먹을 꽉 쥐어야 해

translation.en: Otherwise, you'll damage your knuckles and wrists.
Of course, all of this is irrelevant
translation.ko: 물론 넌 알 필요 없는 얘기야

translation.en: 'cause you're never going to hit anyone again, are you?
translation.ko: 다신 누굴 때릴 일 없을 테니까, 그렇지?

translation.en: He asked where my white stick was.
Said I needed to stay at the back of the stage 'cause…
translation.ko: 난 무대 뒤에 있어야 한댔어 왜냐하면…

translation.en: You're not meant to say the word. That's the point of spelling it out.
translation.ko: 그걸 말로 안 하려고 철자만 읊은 거잖아

translation.en: We don't solve our problems with violence.
Are you going to tell Jordi?
You can call him Dad, you know.
Mmm, I know, I just like the name Jordi.
Yeah, but I still think he prefers for you to call him Dad.
translation.ko: 근데 조르디는 네가 아빠라고 부르는 걸 더 좋아해

translation.en: [woman] I thought I told you, eyes on the ground! Shut the fuck up!
translation.ko: 눈 바닥에 깔라고 했지! 아가리 닥쳐!

translation.en: I told you to keep moving.
[woman in Catalan] Nurse Garcia, please contact Urology.
-[in English] Are you okay? -[Erin] It's okay.
translation.ko: - 괜찮아? - 괜찮아 - 사람들 말이… - 이거 내 피 아니야
- 사람들 말이… - 이거 내 피 아니야

translation.en: Okay, let's get you to a room. Yeah?
Bruised ribs, hip contusion, minor concussions.
translation.ko: 갈비뼈와 엉덩이에 타박상 약간의 뇌진탕이 있네요

translation.en: [doctor] All things considered, it could have been worse.
translation.ko: 험한 상황이었는데 이 정도 부상이면 양호하네요

translation.en: You and Harper are good to go.
[woman in Catalan] We remind you smoking is not permitted in this hospital.
Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas.
[in English] So? [Erin] I'm all right. Just a bit of bruising.
What happened was pretty scary. It's okay not to be okay.
translation.ko: 아까 일은 무서운 상황이었어 안 괜찮아도 괜찮아

translation.en: Hey, I spotted a machine down the hall.
translation.ko: 아까 보니까 복도 끝에 자판기 있던데

translation.en: Why don't you get yourself a snack and a fizzy drink?
You said I'm not allowed any snacks or fizzy drinks after six o'clock.
-I think we can make an exception. -Yeah.
[woman in Catalan] Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas,
at the canteen exit, and at the Emergency entrances.
[in English] As a nurse, they train you to act calm and professional.
Ah, good, 'cause inside I'm completely freaking out.
He lost a lot of blood, though, so he might not make it through the night.
translation.ko: 출혈이 심해서 오늘 밤을 못 넘길 수도 있어

translation.en: Erin, this is not your fault.
But let me see what I can do.
translation.ko: 그래도 가서 볼 수 있나 확인해 볼게

translation.en: Shit. I… I forgot to tell Harper where we were going.
translation.ko: 이런, 하퍼한테 우리 여기 온다고 말하는 걸 깜빡했어

translation.en: It's you, Kate. It's really you.
[man in Catalan] Emergency. All available doctors report to room 124.
translation.ko: 위급 상황, 가능한 의사 선생님은 124호로 와 주세요 여기 앉아 있어

translation.en: Well, you know, they have people at the hospital, uh, counselors.
translation.ko: 에린, 있잖아 병원에서 도움 받아도 돼 상담사나 PTSD 치료 전문가한테

translation.en: Specialists who deal with post-traumatic situations.
Okay. It is going to work. But I still think that we should talk
translation.ko: 그래, 되긴 하네 근데 아까 무슨 일이 있었는지

translation.en: That's why I'm trying to distract you.
translation.ko: 그것 때문에 다른 걸로 정신 팔게 하려고

translation.en: [Jordi] There you go. Three, two, one.
Pour some more in. Come on.
-[Harper] Can I flip it again? -[Jordi] Of course.
But what you said wasn't very nice.
I was hoping I could speak to your parents.

translation.ko: 아빠는 출장 중이고 엄마는 테니스 수업 중이에요

translation.en: Mum's got a tennis lesson. She's round the back.
translation.ko: 아빠는 출장 중이고 엄마는 테니스 수업 중이에요 집 뒤편에 있어요

translation.en: I know. We're coming to her party tonight. It's going to be fun!
translation.ko: 알아, 이따 밤에 파티에 올 거거든, 재밌겠다!

translation.en: -Have you got it fixed yet? -[Jordi] Yeah.
Huh? No. Okay, no, no. No, no.
That is… a work in progress.
Why don't you take the day off?
Oh, I can't. Not with this job review coming up. I need to show my face.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 평가가 코앞인데 부지런히 얼굴 비춰야지

translation.en: Well, can you promise, at least, to not get involved in any armed robberies?
translation.ko: 무장 강도 사건엔 휘말리지 않겠다고 약속해 줄래?

translation.en: I want to say yes… Ears.
Harp, we're going to be late. Move it!
[in English] Wow. Almost made it into your house.
I was going to call around last night.
-I heard what happened at the supermarket. -Oh, we're fine. Don't worry about it.
translation.ko: - 슈퍼마켓 사건 들었어 - 우린 괜찮아, 걱정 마

translation.en: We'll need to interview you today or tomorrow.
translation.ko: 오늘이나 내일 경찰에서 면담 요청 할 거야

translation.en: I'll be on the investigating team, so don't worry about it.
There's not much to say, but okay, sure.
-Hey, if you want coffee, Jordi made some. -Okay. Thank you.
Why does he sleep in his car?
You know how Emilio's wife doesn't live there anymore?
translation.ko: 에밀리오 아내가 이제 저 집에 안 사는 거 알지?

translation.en: Well, he misses her a lot, so he'd rather sleep in the car than an empty bed.
translation.ko: 아내가 너무 그리워서 빈 침대 대신 차를 택한 거야

translation.en: [Emilio in Spanish] Hey, buddy, give me a coffee.
[Erin in English] You don't have to be here if you're not ready yet.
translation.ko: 아직 마음의 준비가 안 됐으면 등교 안 해도 돼

translation.en: -I can take you home. -[Harper] I'm fine.
Oh, uh, see you later, Mum.
We are so glad you are okay.
Is Harper okay? We were so worried.
So… there's bad news and good news.
translation.ko: 있잖아 나쁜 소식과 좋은 소식이 있어

translation.en: So the bad news is Penelope Reyna's lodged a formal complaint
translation.ko: 나쁜 소식은 페넬로페가 하퍼를 학교에서 내쫓으라고 정식 항의서를 냈어

translation.en: to have Harper removed from the school.
translation.ko: 페넬로페가 하퍼를 학교에서 내쫓으라고 정식 항의서를 냈어

translation.en: She's very upset about what happened to her son.
translation.ko: 자기 아들이 맞고 온 거에 잔뜩 화가 나서는

translation.en: She claims Harper is a psychopath.
Olivia, you do know Antonio was making fun of her eye problem.
translation.ko: 안토니오가 먼저 하퍼의 시력 문제를 놀렸어

translation.en: Anyway, people tell me there's a difference, but tomato, tomato.
translation.ko: 둘이 다르다는데 내가 보기엔 그게 그거야

translation.en: I mean, will she succeed or what do I do?
translation.ko: 페넬로페의 항의가 먹힐 것 같아? 어쩌지?

translation.en: The good news. The good news is, well, you got attacked in a supermarket.
translation.ko: 맞다, 좋은 소식 좋은 소식은 네가 슈퍼에서 공격을 당했단 거야

translation.en: How is that good news, Olivia?
Before you were some faceless drone, a totally forgettable substitute teacher,
translation.ko: 이전까지는 그저 특색도 특징도 없는 기간제 교사였는데

translation.en: but now you are a hero who stopped a robbery
and definitely deserves that full-time contract.
translation.ko: 그러니 정규직 교사 계약을 할 만하지

translation.en: Plus, you've got your photo in the paper.
translation.ko: 그러니 정규직 교사 계약을 할 만하지 네 사진도 신문에 실렸어

translation.en: Don't worry. You look great. It's a lovely photo.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 잘 나왔으니까 멋진 사진이야

translation.en: -[bell rings] -Yeah, okay. I need to go.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 잘 나왔으니까 멋진 사진이야 수업 가 봐야 해

translation.en: I'm Mrs. Carter. I'll be filling in for Mr. Luis today.
translation.ko: 오늘 루이스 선생님을 대신해서 온 카터라고 해

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -[Emilio] I was worried.
Look, your interview is scheduled for two o'clock tomorrow.
Sant Àngel station. You're speaking to Inspector Tabarez.
translation.ko: 산트 앙헬 경찰서 타바레스 경감이 면담하게 될 거야

translation.en: Yeah, okay. But did you need to come all the way here to tell me that?
translation.ko: 알았어, 근데 그 얘기 하러 여기까지 온 거야?

translation.en: No, but I want to give you my take on the situation.
translation.ko: 아니, 이 사건에 대한 내 입장을 알려 주려고

translation.en: They knew Thursday was the payroll.
They came at the end of the day, disabled security cameras except…
translation.ko: 슈퍼가 문 닫기 직전에 와서 감시카메라를 망가뜨렸지 근데

translation.en: An older model on a different circuit.
Yeah, well, you hear about these things, don't you?
A woman's child is being trapped under a car,
and she finds the strength to
Or to stab someone in the legs twice with a cake tester
translation.ko: 반죽 테스터로 상대의 다리를 두 번 찌른 다음

translation.en: I didn't shoot anyone. The gun just went off.
translation.ko: 내가 쏜 거 아니야 그냥 총이 발사된 거지

translation.en: No, no, of course not. I mean…
But my boss is a bloodhound,
and he'll be all over this footage, and maybe to him, this will look a little different,
translation.ko: 이 영상을 보고 다른 각도로 해석할지도 몰라

translation.en: so if there's anything you need to tell me, now would be--
translation.ko: 그러니까 숨기는 게 있다면 지금 해야…

translation.en: Only that you're being a bit of a dick right now, okay?
[sighs] Just be careful. There were two of them at the supermarket.
One's dead but the other one… the other one is still out there.
translation.ko: 한 명은 죽었지만 아직 한 명은 체포되지 않았다고

translation.en: -I'll see you at the party. -Yeah, okay. See you later.
Go and find Antonio and say hello to him.
Penelope's going to love that, someone else being the center of attention.
Yeah, maybe I should, I don't know, wish her a happy birthday.
translation.ko: 그러게, 가서 생일 축하 인사라도 건네야 할까 봐

translation.en: -Yeah. -And we will go find the bar.
Yeah, that's an even better idea.
My mum says I've got to apologize to you.
If you don't shake my hand, I'm going to stab your eyes out.
translation.ko: 나랑 악수 안 하면 네 눈을 파 버릴 거야

translation.en: Mmm, thank you, Antonio. You look very smart.
I'm gonna go get some ice cream now.
Harper's very sorry about what happened and I'm sorry too.
translation.ko: 하퍼가 때린 거 정말 미안해해 나도 미안하고

translation.en: Thank you, Erin. That means a lot.
Okay, she's… It's been a lot.
I know, and it breaks my heart.
But the other children need to be protected from her.
Seriously? She's… she's not a danger to anyone.
She doesn't have to be kicked out of school. I can see where she gets her temper from.
translation.ko: - 퇴학은 너무하잖아 - 누구 성미를 닮은 건지 알겠네

translation.en: But I was hoping we could sort this ourselves, as neighbors.
translation.ko: 근데 일 키우지 말고 우리 이웃끼리 해결하자

translation.en: We just live near each other.
You think you're better than everyone else?
You have a giant, naked ice sculpture of yourself. Come on.
translation.ko: 저런 거대한 누드 얼음 조각을 가진 게 누군데?

translation.en: That was a gift of love from my husband.
I will try my best to be a better neighbor,
translation.ko: 네 바람대로 더 나은 이웃이 되도록 노력할게

translation.en: if that's what you want, but please don't…
translation.ko: 네 바람대로 더 나은 이웃이 되도록 노력할게 그러니까 제발

translation.en: don't get Harper expelled. She needs this.
translation.ko: 하퍼를 쫓아내지 마 애한테는 이 학교가 필요해

translation.en: Now move along. You're spoiling the view.
translation.ko: 이제 비켜 내 시야를 망치고 있잖아

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no.
We weren't arguing. I was just asking her the name of her ice sculptor.
translation.ko: 다툰 거 아니야 얼음 조각가가 누군지 물어봤어

translation.en: You never know when you're going to need one.
It was quite impressive, I have to admit.
Do you think she has a special guy for that?
Well, she didn't want to tell me.
I turned the lights off before we left.
Good afternoon, Mrs. Carter. I'm Inspector Tabarez. Let's get started.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 카터 씨 타바레스 경감입니다, 시작하죠

translation.en: In Strasbourg, you were a private tutor to an American family.
Yes, the Palmers. They had two children, Lisa and Mark.
translation.ko: 네, 파머 가족요 아이가 둘이었어요, 리사와 마크

translation.en: And when you started as a substitute at St. Joseph's International,
translation.ko: 성요셉국제학교에서 기간제 교사 일을 시작하실 때

translation.en: this Palmer family were provided as reference.
[Tabarez] The phone number that you gave for them is no longer in use.
translation.ko: 학교에 제출한 가족의 전화번호는 없는 번호더군요

translation.en: No, there is no trace of any such family in Strasbourg at that time.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 그 당시 스트라스부르에는 그런 가족이 있었단 기록도 없어요

translation.en: I… I don't know what to tell you. They were there and…
translation.ko: 뭐라 말씀드려야 할지 모르겠네요 전 분명 거기서 일했고…

translation.en: [Tabarez] Your husband, Jordi Collantes, is a nurse at Hospital General?
He took you to the ICU to see the injured man from the supermarket?
translation.ko: 슈퍼에서 부상당한 남자의 중환자실에 당신을 데려갔고요

translation.en: [Erin] Yes, I felt bad about what happened.
You felt bad about the person who tried to kill you?
I felt bad about what happened. Yes.
translation.ko: 그런 일이 벌어진 게 안타까웠다고요, 네

translation.en: [Tabarez] And was your husband with you when this man suffered his heart attack?
translation.ko: 그 남자가 심장 발작으로 괴로워할 때 남편도 있었나요?

translation.en: No, I asked him to go check on our daughter, Harper.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 우리 딸 하퍼를 좀 살펴보라고 보냈어요

translation.en: Oh, so you were alone with the deceased?
[Erin] Well, Jordi was only gone for a minute
and there was a policeman outside the room the whole time.
Did you know that asphyxiation can bring on a cardiac arrest?
translation.ko: 질식이 심장 정지를 불러일으키는 걸 알았습니까?

translation.en: [Tabarez] So maybe this man died due to complications from his gunshot wound,
translation.ko: 그럼 이 남성은 총상의 합병증으로 죽었거나

translation.en: or maybe someone took a pillow and with their hands…
Hold on. I've done nothing wrong.
translation.ko: 잠시만요, 전 아무 잘못 안 했어요

translation.en: [Tabarez] That is not for you to decide.
Listen. I don't give a fuck what you think the CCTV footage shows you, okay?
translation.ko: 당신이 감시카메라를 어떻게 해석하든 좆도 관심 없어

translation.en: Does it show my daughter, terrified?
translation.ko: 내 딸이 겁에 질린 모습도 나와?

translation.en: Hiding from the man with the fucking gun?
translation.ko: 총을 든 남자를 피해 숨은 채로?

translation.en: There is no footage from the supermarket.
All the cameras had been turned off.
I'm sorry. That must make your job a lot harder.
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 영상이 없다니 조사하기 훨씬 힘드시겠네요

translation.en: And also, sorry for all the swearing.
[in Spanish] Okay. I'll call you in a second. Sorry.
Apparently there was no supermarket footage.
Maybe there was a problem with that other camera after all.
translation.ko: 애초에 다른 카메라에 문제가 있었나 보다

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?
I thought I was helping you.
And what if someone finds out, huh?
Do you know what that makes me look like? Like I've got something to hide.
translation.ko: 내가 어떻게 보이겠냐고 뭔가 숨기는 사람 같잖아

translation.en: [Emilio] I thought it'd be easier this way.
translation.ko: 이렇게 하면 더 수월할 줄 알았어

translation.en: Emilio, I didn't ask for your help. I didn't ask you to steal camera footage.
translation.ko: 에밀리오, 난 너한테 영상 훔쳐 달라고 부탁한 적 없어

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this.
Sometimes I wonder if we made a mistake in coming here.
translation.ko: 여기 온 게 실수였단 생각이 들 때가 있어

translation.en: -You left your glasses in the car. -[Harper] I don't care.
The sun is bad for your eyes.
Good. I want to go blind. I'm bored of waiting.
I'm not hurting you. I'm trying to protect you.
translation.ko: 아프게 하려는 게 아니라 널 지키려는 거야

translation.en: I don't want to go. I like it here.
Do you remember when we first moved here?
And I couldn't keep you out of the water.
You wanted to go to the beach every day.
You'd wake us up at 6:00 a.m. with your costume on.
translation.ko: 새벽 6시면 수영복 입고 우리를 깨우러 왔어

translation.en: And I had to stop because the sun hurts my eyes.
translation.ko: 햇빛이 내 눈에 안 좋아서 더는 못 오게 됐잖아

translation.en: Well, that's why you need to wear your special glasses.
Harp, you can go inside the house. I'm just…
I'm just going to have a quick chat with Penelope.
Of course not. No, she doesn't.
I was just starting to enjoy school.
Please don't let her kick me out.
Listen, she's not going to, okay?
Have you dropped your complaint against Harper yet?
translation.ko: 하퍼에 대한 항의서 아직 철회 안 했어?

translation.en: I'm going to ask you politely one last time.

translation.ko: 안 되는 건 안 되는 거야, 에린

translation.en: having sex with your tennis coach.

translation.ko: - 촬영이나 하고 - 네가 내 가족을 건드렸잖아

translation.en: Your daughter broke my son's teeth. [Erin] I'm not saying this is my finest hour, okay?
translation.ko: - 내 아들의 치아가 부러졌어 - 치사한 방법이란 거 알아

translation.en: But if you don't back down,
I have no choice. I'll send the video to your husband.
translation.ko: 네 남편한테 영상 보내는 수밖에 없어

translation.en: he phoned the morning of my birthday,
translation.ko: 남편이 내 생일 아침에 전화 와서

translation.en: said he wasn't able to make it home.
When I told him I was upset, he said,
he'd paid for the fucking party, what more did I want?
translation.ko: 망할 파티 비용도 대 줬는데 뭘 더 바라냐고 하더라

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that, um…
And I'm not judging you. I'm just…
I see no reason why we can't sort this out between us.
What you've done here, Erin, it was a mistake.
translation.ko: 방금 네가 한 짓, 실수한 거야

translation.en: [Jordi] Dinner is served. How hungry are you?
translation.ko: 저녁 다 됐다, 배 많이 고파?

translation.en: [Jodi] Okay, I will give you a kind-of-hungry portion. Hey.
Here we go. We need to eat fast
if we're going to make it to Harper's musical on time.
They just had too many people or something.
I broke two of Antonio's teeth. Now Mrs. Reyna's trying to expel me.
translation.ko: 내가 안토니오 치아를 부러뜨려서 레이나 씨가 날 퇴학시키려 해

translation.en: I'm sorry. I should've said something. Yeah.
Can we talk about this later? I really need to get changed.
translation.ko: 이 얘긴 나중에 하면 안 될까? 지금 옷 갈아입어야 해

translation.en: [Jordi] Harp, you can eat in front of the TV.
Um, so, you know, Penelope trying to get our daughter kicked out of school,
translation.ko: 페넬로페가 우리 딸을 학교에서 내쫓으려 하는 건

translation.en: it's kind of a big deal.
You could have died the other night.
But you're acting like it was normal.
[Jordi] When did you start keeping things from me and shutting me out?
translation.ko: 언제부터 날 배제하고 숨기는 게 생겼어?

translation.en: [Olivia] Enjoy the show. It's just through this way.
translation.ko: 공연 재밌게 보세요 쭉 가시면 돼요

translation.en: I had a fight with Jordi.
I just don't know how you do it.
translation.ko: 넌 이걸 어떻게 다 하는지 모르겠다

translation.en: You have twice as many kids and responsibilities,
translation.ko: 나보다 애도 책임도 두 배로 많은데

translation.en: but you're always on time, always on form.
I'm so high right now, this is basically an out-of-body experience.
translation.ko: 나 지금 완전 취해서 유체 이탈급의 경험을 하고 있어

translation.en: You're right where you're meant to be.
translation.ko: 네가 있어야 할 곳에 있는 거야

translation.en: Fuck's sake, we're missing it. Come on. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
♪ The stars hanging over your head ♪
translation.ko: 네 머리 위에 떠 있는 별들

translation.en: ♪ The sun burning brightly in red ♪
♪ It all started with a bang ♪
-♪ It started with a bang… ♪ -Hey, I'll be back in one minute.
translation.ko: 이 모든 건 빅뱅으로 시작됐어 금방 올게

translation.en: If you're looking for the restroom, they're back towards the entrance hall.
translation.ko: 화장실 찾으시는 거면 뒤쪽 입구 근처에 있어요

translation.en: I think you should leave before I call security.
You know, I almost didn't believe it.
translation.ko: 그거 알아? 나 못 믿을 뻔했잖아

translation.en: When I saw you in the supermarket, I thought,
translation.ko: 슈퍼에서 널 보고는 잘못 봤나 싶었지

translation.en: "Ah, it must be like a… trick of the light. Must be a mistake."
translation.ko: 슈퍼에서 널 보고는 잘못 봤나 싶었지 조명 때문에 착각한 거라고

translation.en: I think you've mistaken me for someone else.
Yeah, I wasn't planning on staying, Kate.
-But I know you have it. -No, I don't.
translation.ko: - 근데 너한테 있는 거 알아 - 나한테 없어

translation.en: Look at what I've been reduced to.
I'm holding up fucking supermarkets. That's one step above purse snatching!
translation.ko: 소매치기와 별반 다를 거 없는 좆같은 슈퍼 털기나 하고 있다고!

translation.en: And it's all because of what you did.
translation.ko: 이게 다 네가 벌인 짓 때문이야

translation.en: Just give it to me. Then I'm gone. No one else needs to know you're here.
translation.ko: 그것만 주면 사라져 줄게 네가 여기 있는 것도 비밀로 하고

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. Yeah. I want to believe that.
But it's you, so I don't.
translation.ko: 근데 네 입에서 나온 말이라 못 믿겠어

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt the kid, but I'll have to take her with me.
Otherwise, they won't believe me. I'm sorry.
translation.ko: 그래야 다들 내 말을 믿지, 미안

translation.en: She's the woman from the supermarket.
We've got maybe 15 minutes to tidy up and get the fucking body out of here.
translation.ko: 15분 안에 여길 치우고 이 망할 시신 빼내야 해

translation.en: ♪ We share the same solar system… ♪

translation.ko: - 도와주면 더 빨리 끝날 텐데 - 그래

translation.en: ♪ We all share the same intergalactic ♪
translation.ko: 우린 모두 같은 은하계 사이를 공유해

translation.en: -Do you want to say a few words? -What?
I meant a prayer or something.
'Cause you are the wife of my best friend.
I've got mixed up with some bad people.
So maybe I help you and then you help me.
Mrs. Carter in the classroom with a dead body.
translation.ko: 교실에 시신과 함께 있던 카터 선생님

translation.en: What if I don't want to help you?
[woman] I'm getting a bad feeling about this.
And when I get a bad feeling, I just…
[Harper] I think it might be burnt.
[Jordi] How about I cook and you flip, yeah?
translation.ko: 내가 요리하고 네가 뒤집는 건 어때?
